mapper.select: select bibpaper.id, bibpaper.category, bibpaper.title, bibpaper.authors, bibpaper.abstract, bibpaper.descript, bibpaper.hash_tag, bibpaper.hyperlink, bibpaper.bibtex_source, bibitem_source, bibpaper.remark from bibpaper where delete_flag=FALSE limit #{pageable.Pagesize} offset #{pageable.offset}

select bibpaper.id, bibpaper.category, bibpaper.title, bibpaper.authors, bibpaper.abstract, bibpaper.descript, bibpaper.hash_tag, bibpaper.hyperlink, bibpaper.bibtex_source, bibitem_source, bibpaper.remark from bibpaper where id= #{id} and delete_flag=FALSE
mapper.update: update bibpaper set category=#{category}, title=#{title}, authors=#{authors}, abstract=#{abstract}, descript=#{descript}, hash_tag=#{hash_tag}, hyperlink=#{hyperlink}, bibtex_source=#{bibtex_source}, bibitem_source=#{bibitem_source}, remark=#{remark} where id= #{id}
update bibpaper set delete_flag=TRUE where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, category, title, authors, abstract, descript, hash_tag, hyperlink, bibtex_source, bibitem_source, remark from bibpaper where title like '%${bibpaperSort.title}%' and delete_flag=FALSE order by ${bibpaperSort.key} ${bibpaperSort.sorting}

select bibpaper.id, bibpaper.category, bibpaper.title, bibpaper.authors, bibpaper.abstract, bibpaper.descript, bibpaper.hash_tag, bibpaper.hyperlink, bibpaper.bibtex_source, bibitem_source, bibpaper.remark from bibpaper inner join view_log on bibpaper.id = view_log.bibpaper_id where bibpaper.delete_flag=FALSE and bibpaper.${search_key} like '%${keyword}%' order by view_log.time_stamp ${sorting}

select bibpaper.id, bibpaper.category, bibpaper.title, bibpaper.authors, bibpaper.abstract, bibpaper.descript, bibpaper.hash_tag, bibpaper.hyperlink, bibpaper.bibtex_source, bibitem_source, bibpaper.remark from bibpaper inner join bibpaper_register_log on bibpaper.id = bibpaper_register_log.bibpaper_id where bibpaper.delete_flag=FALSE and bibpaper.${search_key} like '%${keyword}%' order by bibpaper_register_log.time_stamp ${sorting}

select bibpaper.id, bibpaper.category, bibpaper.title, bibpaper.authors, bibpaper.abstract, bibpaper.descript, bibpaper.hash_tag, bibpaper.hyperlink, bibpaper.bibtex_source, bibitem_source, bibpaper.remark from bibpaper inner join bibpaper_update_log on bibpaper.id = bibpaper_update_log.bibpaper_id where bibpaper.delete_flag=FALSE and bibpaper.${search_key} like '%${keyword}%' order by bibpaper_update_log.time_stamp ${sorting}

select bibpaper.id, bibpaper.category, bibpaper.title, bibpaper.authors, bibpaper.abstract, bibpaper.descript, bibpaper.hash_tag, bibpaper.hyperlink, bibpaper.bibtex_source, bibitem_source, bibpaper.remark, count(time_stamp) from view_log inner join bibpaper on view_log.bibpaper_id = bibpaper.id where bibpaper.delete_flag=FALSE and bibpaper.${search_key} like '%${keyword}%' group by view_log.bibpaper_id order by count(time_stamp) ${sorting}
